name: Cycling from Nha Trang to Doc Let Beach to Monkey Island 2Days
description: Doc Let Beach is situated on the Ninh Hoa coastal area, 50km north of Nha Trang.Characteristic: It has long white sand dunes of tens meters high with pine trees separate the main land from the sea.Overcome to sand dune, visitors will step on a very wonderful beach with fine sand and contemplate expanses of sand along the seaside of 10km long with pure blue clear sea-water and thousands of light waves inshore. Coming to Doc Let, visitors will have a chance to visit a fishing village, Hon Khoi salt-field, Hon Khoi Cement Factory, Heo Island- an old base with many glorious victories of people in Khanh Hoa through two wars against French and American.
